attributes.action: make it a legal requirement for all offenders who cause or allow violent crimes and deaths, to be charged with all applicable offences.  Resulting sentences should be served consecutively.  Parole should be abolished for all violent crimes and non-accidental deaths.  This should serve to lengthen prison time and better reflect the gravity of these crimes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Too many offenders have been getting off too lightly for violent crimes such as manslaughter, causing or allowing the death of a child, rape, child cruelty & grievous bodily harm. To add insult to injury the vast majority of these vile offenders are released after serving only half their sentences.

Why were the Baby P 3 not also charged with child neglect or cruelty, failing to protect him, destroying evidence or misleading police? They were guilty of all these offences, so why only hold them accountable for his death? 

2 year old Sanam died from 107 injuries & broken bones. Her mother pleaded guilty to charges of 'failing to protect her' & 'allowing her death', demonstrating that all appropriate charges can & should be enforced.

Offenders responsible for causing or allowing any violent crime or non-accidental death, should be held accountable for all their offences. Resulting sentences should then be served consecutively without parole. Only then, might justice actually be served.
